Class Person

java.lang.Object
  Person

public class Person
extends java.lang.Object

A person is a human being. We might use a Person to represent a student or a professor in an academic setting.

          A person's age in years.
 java.lang.String name
          A person's legal name.

          This constructor initializes attributes name and age.

Field Detail

name

public java.lang.String name
A person's legal name. Typically represented as “FirstName I. LastName”.

age

private int age
A person's age in years. No matter how imminent a person’s next birthday is, their age will always reflect how old they were at their most recent birthday.

Constructor Detail

Person

public Person(java.lang.String n,
              int a)
This constructor initializes attributes name and age.

Parameters:
n - The Person's name, in first name - middle initial - last name order.
a - The Person's age.
Method Detail

dogYears

public double dogYears()
This method is used to determine a person's age in dog years.
